name: Departure Times Module
text: This module displays real-time departure times for public transportation.
description: Stay informed about the upcoming departures from your local public transit stations.

name: Weather Widget
text: Get up-to-date weather information with this module, including forecasts and current conditions.
description: Plan your day accordingly by checking the latest weather updates at a glance.

name: News Ticker
text: Stay informed about the latest news with this dynamic news ticker module.
description: Catch up on breaking news and top headlines without leaving your screen.

name: Traffic Monitor
text: Monitor real-time traffic conditions and plan your commute effectively with this module.
description: Avoid traffic jams and delays by staying informed about the current road conditions.

name: Calendar Events
text: Keep track of your upcoming events and appointments with this calendar events module.
description: Never miss an important date by having your calendar events displayed on your screen.

name: Stock Market Updates
text: Stay updated on the stock market with this module, providing real-time stock prices and market trends.
description: Make informed decisions about your investments by monitoring stock market updates.

name: Social Media Feed
text: Stay connected with your social media accounts using this dynamic social media feed module.
description: View the latest posts and updates from your friends and connections without opening your browser.

name: Health and Fitness Tracker
text: Monitor your health and fitness goals with this tracker, providing insights into your daily activity and well-being.
description: Stay on top of your fitness routine and health objectives by visualizing your progress on your screen.
